# Support

## Getting Help

### Documentation
Start with our documentation:
- [Quick Start](../docs/QUICKSTART.md)
- [API Reference](../docs/API_REFERENCE.md)
- [Troubleshooting](../docs/TROUBLESHOOTING.md)

### Community Support
- **Discord**: [discord.gg/contd](https://discord.gg/contd) - Real-time help
- **GitHub Discussions**: For Q&A and discussions
- **Stack Overflow**: Tag questions with `contd`

### Bug Reports
Found a bug? [Open an issue](https://github.com/contd/contd/issues/new?template=bug_report.md)

### Feature Requests
Have an idea? [Request a feature](https://github.com/contd/contd/issues/new?template=feature_request.md)

## Response Times

| Channel | Response Time |
|---------|---------------|
| Discord | Hours |
| GitHub Issues | 1-2 days |
| Security Issues | 48 hours |

## Enterprise Support

For enterprise support options, contact sales@contd.ai.
